0.name: Dislodged
0.fullDesc: Tingyun deals Lightning DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of her ATK to a single enemy.
0.shortDesc: Deals minor Lightning DMG to a single enemy.

0.name: Soothing Melody
0.fullDesc: Grants a single ally with Benediction to increase their ATK by <orangeStrong>{{2, percent}}%</orangeStrong>, up to <orangeStrong>{{4, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of Tingyun's current ATK.\nWhen the ally with Benediction attacks, they will deal <u>Additional</u> Lightning DMG equal to <orangeStrong>{{1, percent}}%</orangeStrong> of that ally's ATK for 1 time.\nBenediction lasts for {{3}} turn(s) and is only effective on the most recent receiver of Tingyun's Skill.
0.shortDesc: <orangeStrong>Increases the ATK</orangeStrong> of a single ally and grants them Benediction. Ally with Benediction additionally deals minor <orangeStrong>Lightning <u>Additional DMG</u></orangeStrong> when attacking.

0.name: Amidst the Rejoicing Clouds
0.fullDesc: Regenerates {{1}} Energy for a single ally and increases the target's DMG by <orangeStrong>{{3, percent}}%</orangeStrong> for {{2}} turn(s).
0.shortDesc: Regenerates a target ally's <orangeStrong>Energy</orangeStrong> and <orangeStrong>increases their DMG dealt</orangeStrong>.

0.name: Gentle Breeze
0.fullDesc: Tingyun immediately regenerates {{1}} Energy upon using her Technique.
0.shortDesc: After using this Technique, this character immediately regenerates Energy for themselves.

0.name: Attack
0.fullDesc: Attacks an enemy, and when the battle starts, reduces their Toughness of the corresponding Type.

0.name: Nourished Joviality
0.fullDesc: Tingyun's SPD increases by {{1, percent}}% for 1 turn after using Skill.

0.name: Knell Subdual
0.fullDesc: DMG dealt by Basic ATK increases by {{1, percent}}%.

0.name: Jubilant Passage
0.fullDesc: Tingyun immediately regenerates {{1}} Energy at the start of her turn.

1.name: Windfall of Lucky Springs
1.desc: After using their Ultimate, the ally with Benediction gains a {{1, percent}}% increase in SPD for 1 turn.

2.name: Gainfully Gives, Givingly Gains
2.desc: The ally with Benediction regenerates {{1}} Energy after defeating an enemy. This effect can only be triggered once per turn.

3.name: Halcyon Bequest
3.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

4.name: Jovial Versatility
4.desc: The DMG multiplier provided by Benediction increases by {{1, percent}}%.

5.name: Sauntering Coquette
5.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

6.name: Peace Brings Wealth to All
6.desc: Ultimate regenerates {{1}} more Energy for the target ally.
